 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָטַשׁ‎</span>] **verb** ==hammer, sharpen, whet== (Late Hebrew ***id., hammer, tap***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎לְטַשׁ‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***sharpen***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***strike, tap***); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִלְטוֺשׁ‎</span> [[Job.16.9|Job 16:9]]; [[Ps.7.13|Ps 7:13]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֵלְטוֺשׁ‎</span> [[1Sam.13.20|1Sam 13:20]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֹטֵשׁ‎</span>; — 

**1.** ***hammer***, only ***Participle*** = ***hammerer*** followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּלתֹֿרֵשׁ‎</span> [[Gen.4.22|Gen 4:22]] ([[BDB#J|J]]). 

**2.** ***sharpen*** sword <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֶרֶב‎</span> (accusative) [[Ps.7.13|Ps 7:13]] compare [[1Sam.13.20|1Sam 13:20]], object <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַחֲרֶשֶׁת‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵת‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַרְדֹּם‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַחֲרֵשָׁה‎</span>; figurative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵינַיִם לִי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> [[Job.16.9|Job 16:9]] my foe ***whets his eye for me*** **Pu\`al** ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּעַר מְלֻטָּשׁ‎</span> [[Ps.52.4|Ps 52:4]] ***a sharpened razor*** (in simile of evil tongue).
